oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Panel on Problems Encountered in the Performance of Clinical Investigations and Proposed Solutions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Crawford, Lester
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Panel moderated by Lester Crawford. Let me begin by introducing to you people, our distinguished panel. I will do it by beginning with the gentleman the closest to me. That is Dr. Calvin Kunin, Dr. Louis Lemberger, Dr. Bill Kay, Dr. Karl Simkins, Dr. Rainer Muser, Dr. Richard Carnevale. Last, but by no means least, is Dr. George Scott. Now, this afternoon on the panel we are going to discuss "Problems Encountered in the Performance of Clinical Investigations and Proposed Solutions.‚Äù
